meanings.definition: Inflammation of the gums, typically leading to the formation of pus.
meanings.sent1: The dentist diagnosed her with pyorrhoea after noticing her swollen gums.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather had to undergo treatment for pyorrhoea to prevent further gum damage.
meanings.sent3: Even the tooth fairy would be scared away by pyorrhoea-ridden gums!
meanings.sent4: The garden hose sprayed water like pyorrhoea, creating a messy scene.
meanings.sent5: The classroom model vividly showed the effects of pyorrhoea on the gums.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the discharge of pus from the gums.
meanings.sent1: The foul smell from his mouth indicated he might have pyorrhoea.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a special mouthwash to help with her pyorrhoea.
meanings.sent3: The pet dog's breath was so bad, it seemed like it had pyorrhoea!
meanings.sent4: The overflowing garbage can looked like it had pyorrhoea, oozing filth.
meanings.sent5: The comic book villain's smile was described as having pyorrhoea, making him even more menacing.
